name: charge
flavor_text: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the userâ€™s Sp. Def stat.
effect_text_extend: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  If the user uses an electric move next turn, its power will be doubled.
effect_text_simple: Raises the user's Special Defense by one stage.  User's Electric moves have doubled power next turn.
